The ID of the component type
the ID of the entity
the ID of the instance of the component

the ID of the component type
the ID of the entity

the ID of the entity

the runrecurrence of the system if it exists if it does not exist then it is the one after it unless it is at the end then the previous run recurrence

member.name: P:Dragonbones.Systems.SystemInfo.Priority
member.summary: The priority of the system, used to determine which systems should be run less frequently in order to maintain frame rate Priority is grouped by RunRecurrence (0 being the lowest, 1 the highest, then everything after)

member.name: P:Dragonbones.Systems.SystemInfo.RunRecurrenceInterval
member.summary: If Set to 0, will run based on priority system only. Otherwise, it represents the number of frames finished between each run

this is used to update info for scheduling

member.name: F:Dragonbones.Systems.SystemType.Render
member.summary: Render systems run as often as possible but logic systems take priority Should only be used for rendering Should not be used to update logic

member.name: F:Dragonbones.Systems.SystemType.Logic
member.summary: Logic systems run on a multiple of 1/60th of a second time step Should only be used for logic Should not be used to draw anything to screen
